\hypertarget{--doc-introduction}{}

\hypertarget{introduction}{}\chapter{What is DiPy?}

\href{http://github.com/matthew-brett/dipy}{DiPy} is a python package for analyzing diffusion data.

Go go team \href{http://github.com/matthew-brett/dipy}{dipy}

\resetcurrentobjects

Being written.  See also \hyperlink{introduction}{\emph{What is DiPy?}}
